thread.title: Chance The Rapper Shares Sneak Preview Of Track With Future
thread.title_full: Chance The Rapper Shares Sneak Preview Of Track With Future

author: Somhairle Cinnsealach
title: Chance The Rapper Shares Sneak Preview Of Track With Future
text:
0 
Chance The Rapper has never been shy about featuring guests on his records and it looks like he’s working on another one that will be no different, as he has shared some brief snippets of a track he’s recorded with Future. 
The pair have linked up before, for “Smoke Break” on Chance’s Grammy Award-winning mixtape Coloring Book. 
Across two short Instagram videos, Chance appears to have shared the hook of the new collab (performed by Future) as well as the first few bars of his own verse. Interestingly, it’s a darker sound than appeared on Coloring Book but the flow is unmistakably Chance. He also tags DJ Esco in one of the clips, so it’s possible the production comes courtesy of the regular Future collaborator. 
Judging by the accompanying captions on Instagram, the track is going to be called “My Peak.” 
After years of dropping EPs and mixtapes, Chance The Rapper revealed in 2016 that he’s started working on his first full-length album , although there’s no telling yet whether this cut will make the tracklist. 
Check the clips below.
